Ben & Jerry’s is extending its ice cream offerings to another species.
The Vermont-based company announced Monday that it has launched Doggie Desserts, a specialty line of ice cream that is made… [+2640 chars]

articles.title: Mistaken identity sends microcap Signal Advance Inc. soaring - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Signal Advance Inc. (OTCPK:SIGL) more than quintupled today after Tesla's (NASDAQ:TSLA) Elon Musk tweeted on Thursday to ``use Signal,'' referencing the secure messaging service.

articles.title: Elon Musk Sends Shares of Signal Advance (SIGL) Soaring on 'Use Signal' Tweet - Bloomberg
